author: shchauha
body:
-added an nSigmaZ cut in fast trajectory seed producer based on beamspot/primary vertex significance (was missing)
-clarified fast trajectory seed producer configuration
-added missing trajectory seed collections.
-cleaner distinction between reco-level cuts (mimicking those from reco tracking) and sim-level cuts (only for performance)
 -improved distance (dz, dxy,nSigmaZ,..) cuts based on either beamspot or primary vertex (PV was never used properly before)
-throw exceptions if an odd trajectory seeding configuration is detected (e.g. tighter sim-level cuts than reco-level)
-renamed iterative tracking collections & labels to the corresponding collections in reco tracking
-utilize more reco tracking configuration in FastSim tracking by, e.g.
    - import trajectory seed selections
     -add track merger modules to reject duplicates
      -...
-Improved emulation of cluster masking: only mask tracks that pass quality criteria (simtrack id masking)
title: Streamlining FastSim tracking (cuts & quality flags) along reco tracking, adapt to reco tracking naming scheme of collections
